        private void addPadding()

      • addPaddingVariable

        private int addPaddingVariable(int row,
                               int padSize,
                               int numPadBits)
        Add a padding variable at the specified row index
        Parameters:
        row - structure table row index at which to insert the padding variable(s)
        padSize - number of padding variables to insert
        numPadBits - number of bits to assign to the padding variable to fill in a sequence of bit-packed variables. 0 if the padding variable isn't associated with bit-packed variables
        Returns:
        Row index below the added padding variable(s)

      • updateTable

        protected void updateTable()
        Update the structure table padding variables in the project database
